title: Spira WaveWalker
features: There's no need to dread a day on your feet! The Spira® WaveWalker cushioned walking shoes utilize signature WaveSpring® tech to reduce strain from walking, work, and standing, keeping you fresh and supported all day long.
Part of the True 4 Width collection, offering four real widths per style.
These walking shoes feature a last that balances a spacious forefoot with a narrower back to reduce heel slip.
Full grain leather upper provides soft, supple wear.

WaveSpring® Technology• Unique design integrates lightweight, stainless steel springs, one in the heel and two in the forefoot.• Springs provide both shock-absorbing cushioning and return of up to 96% of energy• "Mechanical" cushioning is designed to reduce stress on joints.• Designed to last for the lifetime of the shoes. Loop lacing system allows for a versatile fit. Cushioned collar and breathable mesh tongue. Tongue loop allows for midfoot lockdown. Memory Foam in

There's no need to dread a day on your feet! The Spira® WaveWalker cushioned walking shoes utilize signature WaveSpring® tech to reduce strain from walking, work, and standing, keeping you fresh and supported all day long.
Part of the True 4 Width collection, offering four real widths per style.

WaveSpring® Technology• Unique design integrates lightweight, stainless steel springs, one in the heel and two in the forefoot.• Springs provide both shock-absorbing cushioning and return of up to 96% of energy• "Mechanical" cushioning is designed to reduce stress on joints.• Designed to last for the lifetime of the shoes.
WaveSpring® Technology

• Unique design integrates lightweight, stainless steel springs, one in the heel and two in the forefoot.• Springs provide both shock-absorbing cushioning and return of up to 96% of energy• "Mechanical" cushioning is designed to reduce stress on joints.• Designed to last for the lifetime of the shoes.
Loop lacing system allows for a versatile fit.
